thread.section_title: Comedy Driving, Inc. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Comedy Driving, Inc. | comedydriving.com
thread.title: Valerie .P.
thread.title_full: Comedy Driving, Inc. reviewed by Valerie .P.

author: Valerie .P.
title: Valerie .P.
text: Great Online Class!!! I have taken the class in person and the instructor / comedian was hilarious. I thought I would not like the online course, however, I was wrong! I was able to log in numerous times which was great for my hectic schedule. In addition, the video's / information was not boring. The information was very informative. I would recommend this course to family & friends.
